full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================================

### Title (Français) / Title (English)
----------------------------------------

*   **Title (Français) / Title (English)**: Services audiovisuels / Audio Visual Services

### Tender Details
-------------------

*   **Reference Number**: CB-541-29005637
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Solicitation Number**: 84084-23-0039
*   **Publication Date**: November 23, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: December 19, 2023, at 16:00 (UTC-7)

### Contract Details
---------------------

*   **Tender Status (English) / Tender Status (Français)**: Expired / Expiré
*   **Contract Period**: Two (2) years, with two (2) optional one-year periods
*   **Contract Delivery Region (English) / Contract Delivery Region (Français)**: Canada

### Procurement Information
-------------------------

*   **Procurement Category**: SRVTGD
*   **Procurement Method (English) / Procurement Method (Français)**: Competitive - Open bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
*   **Selection Criteria (English) / Selection Criteria (Français)**: Highest combined rating of technical merit and price / Cote combinée la plus élevée pour le mérite technique et le prix

### Trade Agreements
-------------------

*   The Contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Contact Information
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Ngan Loi
*   **Contact Email**: ngan.loi@cer-rec.ca
